successes.title: Galaxy Defenders - The Earth Strikes Back! boardgame
successes.description: The exciting Season 2 of our cooperative science-fiction board and miniature game. Now it's time to fight Aliens on their home planet!

Pledges.description: Supporter - You have our greatest appreciation for your support to our project. Your name will be listed in the GD Agents Hall of Fame on our website.
GD Lab - One copy of KS-Exclusive figures: Agent Tritium, Agent Niobium, Xeno-Lord Master Alien . ***** WORLDWIDE SHIPPING INCLUDED

(EARLY BIRD) Earth Pledge - One copy of "Operation Strikeback" and one copy of "Extinction Protocol" game expansions + Niobium KS Exclusive Miniature + Tritium KS Exclusive Miniature + Earth-level stretch goals.
***** Shipping outside of the USA not included. See "Shipping and Shipping Costs" before you pledge.

(EARLY BIRD 2) Earth Pledge - One copy of "Operation Strikeback" and one copy of "Extinction Protocol" game expansions + Niobium KS Exclusive Miniature + Tritium KS Exclusive Miniature + Earth-level stretch goals. ***** Shipping outside of the USA not included.
